original_text: But when they came to Jesus and saw that he was already dead, they did not break his legs.
korean_text: 예수께 이르러서는 이미 죽으신 것을 보고 다리를 꺾지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: But when they came to Jesus and saw that he was already dead,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 예수께 와서 그가 이미 죽었음을 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: they did not break his legs.
